No, I don't have reproduceable scenario. From other hand I don't create that many local tasks.

BTW, aren't Mylar monitoring all the events? It would be a killer feature to extract that information and create report about that has been done...

Yes, this is something I've talked about with Gail when reading some releated research.  I would like to have the last n interaction events with every bug report submitted.  Adding comment to bug 135605.
